Part I. Maternal nutrition, prevention of obesity and noncommunicable diseases (NCDs):  
recent evidence
Noncommunicable diseases are the leading cause of death and disability in the WHO European Region. 
Unhealthy diets and physical inactivity are major modifiable risk factors for NCDs and obesity, and effective
